<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Obtenir le statut d'un SMS"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/sms/status/{message_id}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Récupère les détails et le statut actuel d'un SMS envoyé

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"message_id","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"},"example":"msg_abc123"}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Statut du message","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"message_id":{"type":"string","example":"msg_abc123xyz","description":"Identifiant unique du message"},"to":{"type":"string","example":"+33612345678","description":"Numéro du destinataire"},"message":{"type":"string","example":"Votre code de vérification est 123456"},"status":{"type":"string","enum":["queued","processing","sent","delivered","failed"],"example":"delivered"},"priority":{"type":"integer","minimum":1,"maximum":5,"default":3,"example":3,"description":"Priorité d'envoi du SMS : 1=très haute (urgent), 2=haute, 3=normale (par défaut), 4=basse, 5=très basse"},"device_id":{"type":"string","example":"dev_xyz789"},"queued_at":{"type":"string","format":"date-time"},"sent_at":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","nullable":true},"delivered_at":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","nullable":true},"metadata":{"type":"object","additionalProperties":true}},"title":"SmsMessage"}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
